Package it.polimi.ingsw.client

Class NetworkHandler

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.ModelObservable
it.polimi.ingsw.client.NetworkHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
ConnectionObserver, BuilderBuildObserver, BuilderMoveObserver, BuilderSetupObserver, ColorChoiceObserver, GodCardChoiceObserver, NewPlayerObserver, NumberOfPlayersObserver, StartPlayerObserver, StepChoiceObserver, java.lang.Runnable
public class NetworkHandler
extends ModelObservable
implements java.lang.Runnable, ConnectionObserver, BuilderBuildObserver, BuilderMoveObserver, BuilderSetupObserver, ColorChoiceObserver, GodCardChoiceObserver, NewPlayerObserver, NumberOfPlayersObserver, StepChoiceObserver, StartPlayerObserver
Manages socket connection with server. It hides network layer between View and Server Controller.
